description: The unique identifier for this KPI set.
name: KPI_ID

description: The business name / title for this KPI set.
name: KPI_NAME

description: The identifier of the KPI group that the KPI is a part of.
name: KPI_GROUP_ID

description: The KPI group identifier for this KPI set.
name: KPI_GROUP_NAME

description: The KPI group name / business area for this KPI set.
name: KPI_OWNER

description: The business description for this KPI set.
name: KPI_DESCRIPTION

description: The level of this KPI. Lower levels are computed first so higher levels can use their KPI results.
name: KPI_LEVEL

description: An array (struct) of two string values that allow us to understand this KPI dimension.

fields.description: The name of the dimension we are holding kpi information about
fields.name: NAME

fields.description: A description of the dimension we are holding kpi information about
fields.name: DETAILS

name: DIM

description: An array (struct) of three string values that allow us to understand this KPI integer measure value.

fields.description: The default aggregation to be applied to this measure (not used yet).
fields.name: AGG

name: INT

description: An array (struct) of three string values that allow us to understand this KPI floating point measure value.

fields.description: The name of the floating point value.
fields.name: NAME

fields.description: The default aggregation to be applied to this measure (not used yet).
fields.name: AGG

name: FLOAT
